{{Item Infobox
|id           = 107004
|type         = Chests
|image        = Item Adventure Treasure Pack.png
|rarity       = 3
|description  = Daily highscore reward. Grants 1 random T1 Character Ascension material.
|source1      = Completing four Daily [[Commissions]].
}}
When a player completes all 4 daily commissions and claims their [[Commissions#Bonus Rewards|bonus rewards]] from [[Katheryne]] they will receive this item along with [[Primogem]]s, [[Adventure EXP]], [[Mora]], and [[Companionship EXP]].

When a player receives this item it will automatically be opened and the player will receive one T1 [[Character Ascension Material]] ([[Agnidus Agate Sliver]], [[Varunada Lazurite Sliver]], etc.)
